text: The Women's 100m freestyle event at the 2010 South American Games was held on March 27, with the heats at 11:01 and the Final at 18:20. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Arlene Semeco '''' |Tatiana Barbosa '''' |Nadia Soledad Colovini '''' |} ==Records== {| class="wikitable" width=75% |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 2010 South American Games |- |World record | |52.07 |Rome, Italy |31 July 2009 |- |Competition Record | |57.18 |Buenos Aires, Argentina |16 November 2006 |- |South American record | |54.72 |Rio de Janeiro, Brazil |18 December 2009 |} ==Results== ===Heats=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" style="width:35em;" style="text- align:center" |- !Rank !!
